Information We Collect

Personal Information: None. We do not collect any personal data such as names, emails, phone numbers, or location data.

Usage Data: None. We do not track your usage patterns or send any analytics data.

Local Data: The app stores calculation history locally on your device only. This data never leaves your device.

Permissions

The app requests only one permission:

  • VIBRATE: Used to provide haptic feedback when buttons are pressed. This does not access any personal information.

Data Sharing

We do not share, sell, or disclose any data because:

  • We don't collect personal information
  • The app functions entirely offline
  • No data is transmitted from your device
  • We have no access to your local data

Your Control

You have complete control over your data:

  • Clear calculation history anytime within the app
  • Uninstall the app to remove all local data
  • Reset app preferences through device settings

Children's Privacy

Our app is suitable for all ages and does not collect any information from children or adults. Since no personal information is collected, no special provisions are needed for children's privacy.

Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted in the app and will be effective immediately upon posting.
